question: my age is 46 yrs(male). my head started throbbing around 10-12 days ago after taking a shower around the parietal lobe area. b.p., sugar level is normal. diabetes is not there. i do not have a running nose or sinusitis. vomitting is not there. i've never suffered from such type of symptoms before. i was taking betavert tablets from last 7-8 days and they were effective. but yesterday i discontinued them and the headache again started. i want to know the cause of my headache.
title: cause of headache
